Articles.Content:
[Thinking to herself] The computer overlays physiological differences as well. They wont be able to tell the difference. If worst comes to worst, bust out using the 011 perimeter.

[Otherwise, he/she remains silent, calmly complying with orders]

I can sense reality.

- - - Updated - - -

Xannari is a fake. The one you have, at least.

- - - Updated - - -

A silicone based clone.
The stun kicks in, knocking out Xannari for 12 hours.
The real Xannari is still aboard your ship.

[Though for the record, stunning wont do anything since you're pushing against photonic energy]

Is something wrong with me?

No, that's certainly the real one in stasis.

ALER ALERT ALERT: INTRUDER DETECTED

Oops

Is it Xannari or another intruder?
That isn't Xannari! It's a clone!
she awakes to find me standing at her cell.
A Xannari clone is aboard the Citadel?

Warning: Proximity alert

unknown ships incoming

hail unsucsessful

- - - Updated - - -

It's an unknown ship incoming! But who?

Xannari attacking? Or another faction? Assemple the GA fleet. defend the Citadel!

Never a dull moment, huh?
Can I at least be told something about what's going on?

Computer, locate intruder...

All ships, defense formation beta 4

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Can I at least be told something about what's going on?

(If they hadn't decided that the Xannari in detention wasn't another clone, I was planning on defending you stating that you were simply indoctrinated by the Attractor)

> 
> Can I at least be told something about what's going on?

You our are still aboard Sampa's ship, but Junior has a clone in stasis. An unknown fleet is incoming to the Citadel.

BOT platoons, watch the landing bay.

Ships coming into view: They're not Xannari... They're the ships that ambushed me that one time.
Ok, helmsmen, let's use the Mass relay network, we have one that is a direct link to the citadel, we go in and begin silent running...
When?
Now is a good a time as any!, the Saren is battered, but she still has her weapons primed and loaded!

Kinemetic torpedoes armed... Ready to fire.

Positron beams armed... Ready to fire

Alternating Frequency shields active... 100%
Xannari clone is still in stasis! Search for true Xannari continues!

The Discovery is ready for battle.

Antimatter weapons Primed
Saren goes through first, Laythe, have your ship follow in close behind! eta to Citadel seven seconds

Dark, did you use the Kinemet I sent you to build the Citadel? It's nearly indestructible.

- - - Updated - - -

> 
> Saren goes through first, Laythe, have your ship follow in close behind! eta to Citadel seven seconds

Got it. I've extended my shields to envelop your ship.

- - - Updated - - -

I can still sense reality, and there's no life forms on that ship.

\*Distress Signal...336798...Citadel Station\* We have intruders on the station, security is doing the best they can but are being overwhelmed!

We're on our way, have security focus on getting the delegates to safety!
It must be computerized.
